pr_title: FaloTheBardClue: Add Avernic to Defender step

timeline.message: FaloTheBardClue: Add Avernic to Defender step

timeline.bodyText:
Remove the double space here

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		new FaloTheBardClue("A sword held in the other hand, red its colour, Cyclops strength you must withstand.", any("Dragon or Avernic Defender",  item(DRAGON_DEFENDER), item(AVERNIC_DEFENDER))),
          
          
            
            		new FaloTheBardClue("A sword held in the other hand, red its colour, Cyclops strength you must withstand.", any("Dragon or Avernic Defender", item(DRAGON_DEFENDER), item(AVERNIC_DEFENDER))),
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
